016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.neo4jprojections;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.api.JsonDomainEvent;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.neo4j.client.Cypher;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.neo4jprojections.spi.Neo4jEventProjection;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.WithMetadata;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
023import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.*;
024import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
025import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.ContractsProvided;
026import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
027import org.neo4j.graphdb.*;
028
029import java.io.IOException;
030import java.util.Iterator;
031import java.util.Map;
032
033@Service(name = "jsondomaineventprojection")
034@ContractsProvided({Neo4jEventProjection.class})
035public class JsonDomainEventNeo4jEventProjection
036        implements Neo4jEventProjection {
037
038    public static final Label ENTITY_LABEL = Label.label("Entity");
039    public static final Label AGGREGATE_LABEL = Label.label("Aggregate");
040
041    @Override
042    public void write(WithMetadata<ArrayNode> events, Transaction transaction) throws Throwable {
043        Map<String, Object> metadataMap = Cypher.toMap(events.metadata().metadata());
044
045        for (JsonNode jsonNode : events.event()) {
046            ObjectNode eventJson = (ObjectNode) jsonNode;
047            String type = eventJson.path("@class").textValue();
048            if (!type.equals(JsonDomainEvent.class.getName()))
049                continue;
050
051            Neo4jJsonDomainEvent neo4jJsonDomainEvent = new Neo4jJsonDomainEvent(new JsonDomainEvent(eventJson));
052            Object timestamp = metadataMap.get("timestamp");
053            Object aggregateId = metadataMap.get("aggregateId");
054            String aggregateType = metadataMap.get("aggregateType").toString();
055            if (eventJson.has("created")) {
056                ObjectNode created = (ObjectNode) eventJson.path("created");
057                Node node = transaction.createNode(Label.label(created.get("type").textValue()), ENTITY_LABEL);
058
059                for (String label : neo4jJsonDomainEvent.labels()) {
060                    node.addLabel(Label.label(label));
061                }
062
063                node.setProperty("created_on", timestamp);
064                node.setProperty("last_updated_on", timestamp);
065                String id = created.get("id").textValue();
066                node.setProperty("id", id);
067                if (aggregateId != null) {
068                    node.setProperty("aggregate_id", aggregateId);
069                }
070
071                attributes(eventJson, node);
072                addedRelationships(eventJson, transaction, node);
073                removedRelationships(eventJson, node);
074
075                // Create/update aggregate node
076                if (aggregateType != null && aggregateId != null) {
077                    Node aggregateNode = null;
078                    if (!id.equals(aggregateId)) {
079                        aggregateNode = transaction.findNode(AGGREGATE_LABEL, "id", aggregateId);
080                    }
081
082                    if (aggregateNode == null) {
083                        aggregateNode = transaction.createNode(Label.label(aggregateType), AGGREGATE_LABEL);
084                        aggregateNode.setProperty("created_on", timestamp);
085                        aggregateNode.setProperty("id", aggregateId);
086                    }
087                    aggregateNode.setProperty("last_updated_on", timestamp);
088                }
089            } else if (eventJson.has("updated")) {
090                ObjectNode updated = (ObjectNode) eventJson.path("updated");
091                Node node = transaction.findNode(ENTITY_LABEL, "id", updated.get("id").textValue());
092
093                for (String label : neo4jJsonDomainEvent.labels()) {
094                    Label labelUpdate = Label.label(label);
095                    if (!node.hasLabel(labelUpdate)) {
096                        node.addLabel(labelUpdate);
097                    }
098                }
099
100                if (node != null) {
101                    node.setProperty("last_updated_on", timestamp);
102
103                    attributes(eventJson, node);
104                    addedRelationships(eventJson, transaction, node);
105                    removedRelationships(eventJson, node);
106
107                    // Update aggregate node
108                    if (aggregateType != null && aggregateId != null) {
109                        Node aggregateNode = transaction.findNode(AGGREGATE_LABEL, "id", aggregateId);
110                        aggregateNode.setProperty("last_updated_on", timestamp);
111                    }
112                }
113            } else if (eventJson.has("deleted")) {
114                ObjectNode deleted = (ObjectNode) eventJson.path("deleted");
115                String id = deleted.get("id").textValue();
116
117                if (id.equals(aggregateId)) {
118                    try (ResourceIterator<Node> entityNodes = transaction.findNodes(ENTITY_LABEL, "aggregate_id", aggregateId)) {
119                        while (entityNodes.hasNext()) {
120                            Node entityNode = entityNodes.next();
121                            detachDelete(entityNode);
122                        }
123                    }
124
125                    Node aggregateNode = transaction.findNode(AGGREGATE_LABEL, "aggregate_id", aggregateId);
126                    aggregateNode.delete();
127                } else {
128                    Node node = transaction.findNode(ENTITY_LABEL, "id", id);
129                    detachDelete(node);
130
131                    // Update aggregate node
132                    if (aggregateType != null && aggregateId != null) {
133                        Node aggregateNode = transaction.findNode(AGGREGATE_LABEL, "id", aggregateId);
134                        aggregateNode.setProperty("last_updated_on", timestamp);
135                    }
136                }
137            }
138        }
139    }
140
141    private void attributes(ObjectNode eventJson, Node node) {
142        JsonNode jsonNode;
143        jsonNode = eventJson.path("attributes");
144        if (jsonNode instanceof ObjectNode attributes) {
145            Iterator<String> names = attributes.fieldNames();
146            while (names.hasNext()) {
147                String name = names.next();
148                JsonNode value = attributes.get(name);
149                if (value instanceof TextNode textNode) {
150                    node.setProperty(name, textNode.textValue());
151                } else if (value instanceof NumericNode numericNode) {
152                    if (numericNode.isFloatingPointNumber()) {
153                        node.setProperty(name, numericNode.doubleValue());
154                    } else {
155                        node.setProperty(name, value.longValue());
156                    }
157                } else if (value instanceof BooleanNode booleanNode) {
158                    node.setProperty(name, booleanNode.booleanValue());
159                } else {
160                    LogManager.getLogger(getClass()).warn("Could not handle domain event attribute of type:" + value.getNodeType());
161                }
162            }
163        }
164    }
165
166    private void addedRelationships(ObjectNode eventJson, Transaction transaction, Node node) {
167        JsonNode jsonNode;
168        jsonNode = eventJson.path("addedrelationships");
169        if (jsonNode instanceof ArrayNode addedRelationships) {
170            for (JsonNode addedRelationship : addedRelationships) {
171                if (addedRelationship instanceof ObjectNode relationship) {
172                    Node relatedNode = transaction.findNode(Label.label(relationship.get("type").textValue()), "id", relationship.get("id").textValue());
173                    if (relatedNode != null) {
174                        node.createRelationshipTo(relatedNode, RelationshipType.withName(relationship.get("relationship").textValue()));
175                    }
176                }
177            }
178        }
179    }
180
181    private void removedRelationships(ObjectNode eventJson, Node node) {
182        JsonNode jsonNode;
183        jsonNode = eventJson.path("removedrelationships");
184        if (jsonNode instanceof ArrayNode removedRelationships) {
185            for (JsonNode removedRelationship : removedRelationships) {
186                if (removedRelationship instanceof ObjectNode relationship) {
187                    String id = relationship.get("id").textValue();
188                    for (Relationship nodeRelationship : node.getRelationships(RelationshipType.withName(relationship.get("relationship").textValue()))) {
189                        Node otherNode = nodeRelationship.getOtherNode(node);
190                        if (id.equals(otherNode.getProperty("id"))) {
191                            nodeRelationship.delete();
192                            break;
193                        }
194                    }
195                }
196            }
197        }
198    }
199
200    private void detachDelete(Node node) {
201        for (Relationship relationship : node.getRelationships()) {
202            relationship.delete();
203        }
204        node.delete();
205    }
206}
